title: AI Image Generators Without Prompts: The Fast Way to Create Visual Content
summary:
Discover a faster, more intuitive way to create branded visuals using AI — 
no prompts required. Upload your own assets and generate on-brand content 
at scale with Freeform Diffusion.

title: Brand- Aligned Visuals with AI for Agencies
summary:
Creative and marketing agencies can now generate brand-aligned visuals at 
scale. Try Playform’s Freeform Diffusion to deliver fast, consistent client 
content — without prompts. Visit https://create.playform.io/login

title: Generate Brand-Consistent Content with AI
summary:
Create brand-consistent visuals without writing prompts. With Freeform 
Diffusion by Playform, you can generate hundreds of on-brand images from 
your own assets. Try it now at https://create.playform.io/login

title: Generate without Prompts: What are your options?
summary:
Tired of writing prompts? Discover how visual-first AI tools like Freeform 
Diffusion by Playform let you generate stunning, consistent images from 
your own uploads — no text required. Ideal for artists, designers, and 
content creators who want full control.

title: What is real-time generation? and why it will change generative art and design in 2024?
summary:
Real-time Interactive generation is the ultimate tool for creative design. 
Iterate fast on your ideas with help of prompt and/or sketch

title: The Magic of Art Creation: Transforming Sketches into Masterpieces with Playform
summary:
Example of a sketch by Van Gogh finished using sketch+text-to-image tool in 
Playform

title: The New Sketchbook: Playform Conducts First Sizable Survey into AI Art Practices
summary:
Text-to-image or Text-to-art is and AI image generation technology that has 
dominated the AI art scene in 2022 and gaining more popularity in 2023. 
What artist think about text-to-image technology ? How they use it? how it 
is aligned with their creative process? We conducted this survey to 
understand what artist think about this technology.

title: Patrick Lichty Creates AI Generated Rugs with Playform, Featured on Art Mine
summary:
With the launch of Art Mine, a unique art gallery that invites the 
collector to participate in the curation of AI-generated art, Playform 
Studio Manager Mirabelle sat down with contributing Art Mine artist Patrick 
Lichty to discuss his Semantic Carpet project.

title: Playform Puts GAN on the Blockchain, Introducing Genesis Projects
summary:
Discover how Playform is revolutionizing digital creativity with Genesis 
Projects—AI-generated artworks powered by GANs and secured on the 
blockchain. Explore how artists are creating unique NFTs that merge 
generative art with verified ownership, offering a bold new direction for 
the future of AI art.

title: 5 Things You Can Do With FaceMix
summary:
FaceMix is for everyone, whether you’re an experienced photographer that 
needs to make detail-level edits or a user that just wants to know what 
your babies will look like. Read on to learn more about what you can do 
with FaceMix, and get started for free!

title: How to Buy Generative AI Art NFTs on Art Mine
summary:
Playform is the first platform to put GAN on the blockchain! Learn about 
how to buy one-of-a-kind generative AI art NFTs on Art Mine.

title: Join Playform’s 30-Day Art Challenge, Powered by Honā
summary:
As we find time and time again, creating healthy habits that align with our 
resolutions will allow us to achieve them. A way to build up these habits 
is to do something daily. As an artist, creating daily art pieces allows 
for you to stretch your artistic muscle and create content. Communities of 
people have attempted to mold these habits through Everyday Art Challenges.

title: How to Create a MetaMask Wallet
summary:
New to collecting AI-generated art NFTs? Learn how to easily set up a 
MetaMask wallet to buy, mint, and sell digital art on platforms like 
Playform and OpenSea. This beginner-friendly guide walks you through the 
essential steps for getting started with Ethereum and Polygon 
wallets—perfect for artists, collectors, and anyone exploring the world of 
generative AI art.

title: Chris Trueman’s Playform Exhibition Launches on CreatoRanch, a New NFT Marketplace
summary:
Explore AI Visions, a groundbreaking exhibition by Chris Trueman that 
merges abstract art with generative AI. Using Playform’s cutting-edge AI 
tools, Trueman blurs the line between human creativity and machine 
intelligence—revealing new dimensions in AI-generated artwork and digital 
abstraction.

title: How to Mint NFTs on OpenSea
summary:
Ready to turn your AI-generated art into NFTs? This step-by-step guide 
shows you how to mint digital artwork using Playform and OpenSea. Learn how 
to connect your MetaMask wallet, create collections, and start selling AI 
art on the world’s largest NFT marketplace.

title: New Pro-Art Filters Available by Anthromorph
summary:
Discover Anthromorph’s Pro-Art Filters on Playform—AI-powered tools that 
fuse fantasy, biology, and surrealism to create transformative digital 
self-portraits. Perfect for artists exploring generative AI and 
experimental visual expression.

title: New Credit System, Crypto Payments, 12X Upscaling and More!
summary:
Playform unveils a new credit system, flexible crypto payment options, and 
12X AI image upscaling—designed to make creating and owning AI-generated 
art easier than ever. Learn how these updates empower digital artists with 
more control, transparency, and creative flexibility. Learn more at 
https://www.playform.io/

title: Meet Mark Humes, Playform Featured Pro-Art Filter Artist
summary:
Discover how artist Mark Humes uses AI-powered Pro-Art Filters on 
Playform.io to create deeply personal and abstract digital art. Explore his 
journey blending emotion and technology through generative AI tools 
designed for modern creators.

title: 10 Discords to Follow as an NFT Artist
summary:
As we adjust and evolve in this digital age, we need to utilize the 
opportunities and resources that accompany it. Despite the obvious 
influence that social media like Instagram and Twitter have, one social 
media platform has been on the rise and could offer so much more- Discord.

title: New Pro-Art Filters by Playform Artists Available Now
summary:
Experience Playform’s latest AI-powered Pro-Art Filters—designed by 
featured artists to help you transform photos, sketches, and portraits into 
stunning AI-generated artwork. Try it now at www.playform.io.
